title: Marysville Mourns Students Who Died In School Shooting
teaser: A 14-year-old girl wounded in the shooting has died, raising the death toll in to three, including the student who opened fire.
contentencoded:
A 14-year-old girl who was wounded when a student opened fire inside a Washington state high school has died, raising the death toll in the shooting to three.

Another girl was killed Friday when a popular freshman at Marysville-Pilchuck High School north of Seattle opened fire. The shooter also died.

The school will remain closed this week — classes suspended out of respect for the victims. Yesterday, students and family members met at the school with grief counselors. From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Deborah Wang of KUOW has more.

  • Read more on this story via KUOW

Reporter

  • Deborah Wang, news and feature reporter for KUOW. She tweets @KUOWdebwang.
